name: ICE: Intergalactic combat engagement
description:
For the last 10 years earth has been besieged by the invading alien forces of the Ziddian Empire! Now on the brink of destruction humanity mounts one last final effort to take out this alien menace for good. You are Earth's greatest pilot and you alone hold the fate of mankind in your hand!

I have always loved retro style arcade games so I thought I would try my hand at making one for my self. With ship upgrades, power ups and an assortment of enemies and bosses I put allot of heart into this game.

Like my other games this serves as more of an interactive portfolio for me to demonstrate my sound design and audio programming skills!

I feel I have allot more I can do with this game in the future so I have already planned out some awesome new additions to the game like different playable ships, more stages and environments, new interesting enemies and a ton of new songs and SFX.

If you do find any bugs or notice anything weird please message me and let me know!

Thank you for downloading

W.

Soundtrack: https://soundcloud.com/chris-wadey/sets/ice-soundtrack
